q: announced that it was passing all its evidence to the Director of Public Prosecutions Keir Starmer for lawyers at the CPS to review. Asked about Mr Chris Huhne 's comments, Prime Minister David Cameron 's spokesman told reporters: The position at the present time is that the Crown Prosecution Service are carrying out an assessment of the information that is held by the Metropolitan Police. That process is under way and it is up to the CPS to make a decision on their assessment.`` The Prime Minister's position is that if there are allegations of illegal behaviour, then those allegations need to be taken very seriously, but in all cases it is a matter for the police and the CPS. Eric Schmidt , previously CEO of Novell and CTO of Sun Microsystems, has by far the most enterprise experience in the triumvirate that runs Google, which also includes co-founder Sergey Brin . Eric Schmidt clearly had passion for enterprise software, says Gartner analyst Whit Andrews.`` He cared about enterprise software. Colin Powell , a retired Army general, said he won't decide whom to vote for until he sees all the candidates.
